Open Sub Search

Open source subtitle search app
built by @iboshkov.

  • Download Latest
  • Contribute

Open Sub Search is a project to make searching for subtitles faster, easier and more convenient.

It's open-source under the permissive MIT license, which means any contributions to keep the project going or add new features are welcome.

Open Sub Search © 2017 Ilija Boshkov. Stellaris Design: HTML5 UP. Jekyll port: Andrew Banchich.
